amendment.description: Amendment expands the definition of "fire-ready-community" in the bill to say that a community satisfies the definition if it is located within a priority area identified by fire risk maps and can meet two of the other four criteria listed in the bill for "fire-ready-communities".
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 111-52 to amend the definition of `fire-ready community' in the bill to provide that a community satisfies the definition if it is located within a priority area identified by the fire risk maps required by the bill, and meets two of the other four criteria listed in the bill for `fire-ready communities.'.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kirkpatrick (AZ) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 2 (Roll no. 160).
